page.title: 13Grandad: Durham Councillor
page.content: In 1975 my grandad,{Councillor {Joe Paterson,}was elected{Mayor of {Darlington. }He has been elected many times by the voters of Eastbourne Ward, Darlington. During elections I help to collect numbers, mark a register and give out leaflets. In 1983 my grandad was elected Vice-chairman of the{Durham County {Council}and this year, following the elections he was made Chairman. At important meetings my family and I sit in the public gallery of the council chamber. There we see many of the chief officials. Near the Vice- Chairman are three lights. When the white one shines the speaker may continue; orange shows half his time has gone, but when the red one shines he must stop. {Andrew Paterson
